DOC.brief_title: NAC Preventing CIN CRF Patients Who Need Enhanced CT Scan ED
DOC.detailed_description: CIN frequent CRF patient . However study CIN focus elective PCI patient . There study NAC sodium bicarbonate would help prevent CIN CRF patient need enhance CT scan ED . Our intention investigate effect NAC sodium bicarbonate prevent aggravation renal function chronic renal failure enhance computed tomography scan check emergency room .
DOC.criteria: CRF patient need enhance CT scan less 15 year old hypersensitivity NAC dialysis consent patient next kin
